short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Reveal the sold prices on Etsy product pages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Displays the sold price on Etsy listings for Sold Out items. Quickly displays the price next to 'Sold' on the page. Super lightweight tool that does not connect to any external server or send your data anywhere. 

Has support for all currencies and languages that Etsy supports.

Etsy is a trademark of Etsy, Inc. This application runs on top of the Etsy website, but is not endorsed, connected, or certified by Etsy, Inc.
